artist: Artist: George Cruikshank; Publisher: David Bogue, London
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Thirza J. Cleveland
portfolio: From Plate IV from The Drunkard's Children (A Sequel to the Bottle), David Bogue, London
provenance: Thirza Cleveland, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1994.
title: Urged on by his Ruffian Companions, and Excited by Drink, he Commits a Desperate Robbery -- he is Taken by the Police at a Three-Penny Lodging House
